creditline: Gift of the Joseph F. McCrindle Collection
description: woman wearing a sleeveless gown and a veil seated side-saddle on a horse with a thick mane; man with curly hair wearing a shirt with a ruffled collar stands behind horse; brown wash tones
medium: Pen and brown ink and wash over black chalk on paper
provenance: Joseph F. McCrindle (until d. 2008); Joseph F. McCrindle Foundation (2008-2009; given to MIA).
title: Young Man Accompanying a Young Woman on Horseback
